definition: to surrender (of a fortress)/to fall (to the enemy)/subsidence (of land)
pitfall/trap/to get stuck/to sink/to cave in/to frame (false charge)/to capture (a city in battle)/to fall (to the enemy)/defect
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
area of subsidence

sentences.english: Eventually fall joinville city, the people were massacred in the city, the Ming army on the sidelines is not saved.
sentences.chinese: 最终晋州城陷落，城内百姓惨遭屠杀，明军旁观不救。

sentences.english: This paper presents the details of investigation of the subsided column by seismic reflected wave method.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了利用反射波地震法探测陷落柱的情况。

sentences.english: Jean Valjean felt the pavement vanishing beneath his feet. He entered this slime.
sentences.chinese: 冉阿让感到沟道在脚下陷落了，他踏进了泥浆。

sentences.english: It is probable that this vanishing of hell in our rear is inherent to the arrival of paradise.
sentences.chinese: 地狱在我们背后的陷落原是和进进天堂连在一起的。

sentences.english: The fort fell into the enemy's hands without a shot being fired.
sentences.chinese: 一枪未发堡垒就陷落敌手。

sentences.english: To use monadic means is difficult to correctly locate hidden water flowing subsided columns.
sentences.chinese: 目前单一探测手段难以准确探测隐伏导水陷落柱。

sentences.english: Five Chinese prisoners of war are buried alive by their Japanese captor s just outside Nanking after the fall.
sentences.chinese: 在南京陷落后，五名中国战俘被日军在城外活埋。

sentences.english: Galaxy fall, love boil, with a total than Acacia.
sentences.chinese: 银河陷落，爱意沸腾，总不比乞巧合欢。

sentences.english: The next step is the complete colla eof the markets of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 下一步就是整个经济中的市场陷落崩溃阶段。

sentences.english: This article introduces the exposed character of subsided column under the well of Taoyuan coal mine, Huaibei Coal Mining Bureau, Anhui Province.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了桃园煤矿井下所见陷落柱的出露特征。

sentences.english: Last year the final bastion fell.
sentences.chinese: 就在去年，最后的堡垒陷落了。

sentences.english: In the common situation, the seismic response of small scale karst collapse column (KCC) is not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，较小规模陷落柱的地震响应特征不明显。

sentences.english: TYPICAL USE:Out feet slumped repeatedly through the melting ice.
sentences.chinese: 经过融化的冰时，我们的脚一再地陷落。

sentences.english: The city fell to the enemy.
A half-graben is a downdropped block bounded by a normal fault on only one side.
sentences.chinese: 半地堑是向下陷落的断块，只在一侧是以正断层为界。
